title: Egg-free chocolate yoghurt cake with lemon icing
ingredients: ['50g butter', '200g caster sugar', '225g yoghurt (light, plain or vanilla)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250g self raising flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '3 tablespoons cocoa powder', '150g icing sugar', '3 tablespoons lemon juice']
